https://tmrev.io/movie/284278-Dearest 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qKFmTRcVz7u9p3tDNtrBFGqsini.jpg Drawing on remarkable true stories, Peter Chan delivers a moving drama about child abduction in China. Huang Bo stars as a father whose young son disappears in the streets of a big city. He sets out on a search across China, stopping at nothing to find him. In this star-studded cast, Zhao Wei plays the role of a mother from a poor rural area. Dearest
